subItems.name: Tomato Basil Italian Pizza
subItems.description: Dressed with oil, the origanum and garlic cloves shredded minutely.Fresh tomato sauce with Parmesan cheese, jalapeno peppers, red peppers.

subItems.name: Bombay Pizza
subItems.description: Spicy tomato sauce with italian herbs,mushrooms, onion, cottage cheese, coriander and mozzarela.

subItems.name: Sicilia Pizza
subItems.description: A thick base pizza with fresh tomato sauce, mushrooms, garlic, pickled onions.

subItems.name: Potato Corn Burger
subItems.description: Stacks of corn fritters, jyicy grilled tomato slices and garlic aioli in soft burger buns.

subItems.name: Supreme Veggie Burger
subItems.description: Cooking the onion and garlic, spice and veggie broth elevates these burgers to the greatest.

subItems.name: Rajma Patty Burger
subItems.description: A black bean burger would simply be a patty made from beans, if didn't add some pizazz.
